benchmark_details.name: WebGames
benchmark_details.overview: WebGames is a comprehensive benchmark suite designed to evaluate general-purpose web-browsing AI agents through a collection of 50+ interactive challenges that systematically test the limitations of current AI systems across various browser interactions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capabilities of web-browsing AI agents and measure their progress over time.

data.source: Challenges are designed and implemented open-source using standardized JSONL format.

methodology.calculation: Success rate is calculated by comparing AI performance against human performance metrics.
methodology.interpretation: A high success rate indicates better performance of AI agents in completing web-browsing tasks.
methodology.validation: Challenges are evaluated with verifiable ground-truth solutions.
